projects.title: Photomosaic of the Wrack
projects.description: An image processing project that creates a photomosaic of the wrack. It uses image processing to create a photomosaic of the wrack from a collection of underwater images.

projects.title: Solar Irradiance Detection
projects.description: An image processing project that detects solar irradiance. It uses image processing to find sun location and includes a polynomial regression model to predict solar irradiance.

projects.title: Underwater Line Tracking
projects.description: An image processing project that tracks lines underwater. It uses image processing to detect and track lines underwater.

projects.title: Shape Detection with RDP Algorithm
projects.description: An image processing project that detects shapes with the Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm. Also Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm is implemented from scratch.

projects.title: Ocean Rush
projects.description: An endless runner game related with sea life. The player controls a sea creature and tries to avoid obstacles and collect coins.

projects.title: Project Deja Vu
projects.description: A multiple ending escape room game. The player tries to escape from a room by solving puzzles and finding clues.

projects.title: Project Space
projects.description: A multiple ending puzzle game. The player tries to solve puzzles and make decisions to reach different ends.
